sentences.en: " I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat "
sentences.cn: “ 我能奉献的只有鲜血 、 辛劳 、 眼泪和汗水 ”

sentences.en: A lion was caught in the toil.
Every single grain is the result of toil.
sentences.cn: 每一粒粮食都来之不易.

sentences.en: He succeeded after years of toil.
sentences.cn: 他经历数年的辛劳之后成功了.

sentences.en: He was destined to plod the path of toil.
sentences.cn: 他注定要在艰辛的道路上跋涉.

sentences.en: He was facing a life of toil and drudgery and vexation.
sentences.cn: 摆在他面前的是终身的苦役和折磨.

sentences.en: I shall have to toil and moil all my days.
sentences.cn: 我必须一年到头拼命地干.

sentences.en: People who toiled in dim, dank factories were too exhausted to enjoy their family life.
sentences.cn: 在阴暗潮湿的工厂里苦作的人们精疲力竭了，无法享受家庭生活。

sentences.en: That book is a toil to read.
The book is a toil to read.
The ear is deafened with the sounds of worldly toil.
sentences.cn: 耳朵里充满了人世苦难的呼声.

sentences.en: The farmer's toil was rewarded with good crops.
sentences.cn: 那个农夫以辛勤的劳动换得了好收成.
所得的快乐超过付出的辛劳.

sentences.en: The wealth comes from the toil of the masses.
sentences.cn: 财富来自大众的辛勤劳动.

sentences.en: They spent months of toil on the water conservancy project.
sentences.cn: 他们为这项水利工程辛辛苦苦地干了几个月.

sentences.en: We were [ felt ] quite exhausted with the toil.
sentences.cn: 我们因那件辛苦的工作而感到十分疲惫.
工人们长时间辛苦工作。

trans.tran_cn: 报酬很低的苦活，苦工，罗网，圈套
trans.tran_en: hard unpleasant work done over a long period
to work very hard for a long period of time

trans.tran_cn: 长时间或辛苦地工作，艰难缓慢地移动，跋涉
